data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Gers.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gers, Occitanie, France
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Gers, Occitanie, France humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary: On average, 12 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Gers, Occitanie, France.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 119,002 cultural Christians in the county of Gers to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Gers, Occitanie, France.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Iu Mien people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Iu Mien people.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Gers, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 2,391 believers in Gers to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 192,209 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Gers, Occitanie, France and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
